 Inputting rules (6/7)                  
                                        
                                        
 * PBR                                  
                                        
 * * Our goal with PBR moderation is to 
   prevent malicious inputs from making 
   the game less enjoyable for other    
   bettors, not to prevent people from  
   learning and making mistakes. The    
   perceived intent of the inputs is    
   what will determine the punishments.
